card_text: This card can activate these effects depending on the monster card types on the field.$N●Fusion: Once per turn, if a monster(s) is sent from your hand or field to the GY by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can draw 1 card.$N●Synchro: When a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned (except during the Damage Step): You can increase their Levels by 1.$N●Xyz: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Destroy the monster(s) on the field with the highest Level.$NYou can only activate 1 "Dreamland" per turn.
